grammar.title: Grammar
grammar.desc: It's important part of the language, the root must be good for the tree to be strong and blossom info fruit.

speaking.title: Speaking
speaking.desc: Communication is a two-way interaction, proper and accurate is the stepping stone to being good at speaking and listening.

listening.title: Listening
listening.desc: Practice listening proactively to increase language exposure, improve language listening and understanding.

writing.title: Writing
writing.desc: Practice writing from basic to advanced. Good at writing is all you need.

ques1.title: Who is this course for?
ques1.ans: G-EDU has full range of courses for everyone interested in Korean. Please contact us for advice on suitable courses..

ques2.title: CAN I TAKE A TRIAL LEARNING EXPERIENCE?
ques2.ans: G-EDU doesn not just provides trial course. Students can register for the first day of course. If they are not satisfied, we will full-Refund you paid.

ques3.title: How to register course?
ques3.ans: Just use your phone and contact us. We will instruct you.

ques4.title: Does G-EDU has has online course?
ques4.ans: G-EDU designs separate online and ofline courses. You can choose one of them to start learning.

ques5.title: Does G-EDU support out of teaching time?
ques5.ans:
At 3rd floor in G-EDU, students can use free library space to read Korean book, practice Korean personal or with group.
In particular, students can be consulted with the founders of the center on 'all worries' (post-hoc orientation, plan to study abroad, choose a career, etc.)

ques6.title: WHY SHOULD CHOOSE G-EDU TO start learning Korean?
ques6.ans:
At G-EDU, We choose 'practical teaching' and 'practical learning'.
The enthusiasm, expertise, and vision of the center's founding team will be valuable and 'open' resources for all G-EDU's students to take advantage.
G-EDU offers special lectures, talks, exchange workshops for students.

block2.title: Leave your information
block2.desc: If you have any question about curriculum, leave your information and we will contact you as soon as possible.

form.successMss: Thank you for your interest in the curriculum, we will contact you again as soon as possible!
